marklogic.body: WTF have I missed today? I don't know, I go Off and start a new job and y'all start WW3 in my absence! So as I'm tired and grumpy, (because I barely get the chance to click on Robsessed these days) can anyone give me the 2-min rundown on what exactly has transpired on this thread today because judging by the thread count and some of the more recent Heated posts, I'm figuring there's been some action that I've missed out on... and that makes me even more grumpy. Pleeeeeeeeeease fill me in, someone? Anyone? Boo hoo... I feel all lonely and neglected... and ignorant.. and in the dark.... mwaaaahhh!!
